title: Password and Username not working
body: So, my friend can not log into his League Of Legends account. His username and password keep saying invalid when he has not changed the password. He can not go into his account and change his passwords due to him sending it to a email he no longer remembers the password for. What can he do to retrieve it...?

replies.body:
It sounds like your friend's account may have been compromised. I recommend your friend reach out to our account specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and filling out as much information as they can remember about the account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
